response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your highest expectations. This product is not just an item; it's an investment in excellence and unparalleled quality. Given its immense value to you, I am offering it at a special introductory price of $950,000. This exclusive opportunity allows you to secure this masterpiece at a significant discount compared to its market value. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer, or if you have any questions about the product. I am here to assist you every step of the way.", "product_price": 950000}
